ShaderNodePreset.Description:
This shader creates crezy digital noise structures.
IMPORTANT: This shader is TOTALLY random. It will create a different pattern, everytime you copy it or replace it.
THIS SHADER ONLY WORKS ON A MAC SYSTEM !!!
Setup: - Scale: scale in / out of the texture
Demo clip: http://vimeo.com/113834178
Matchbox version by ivar@inferno-op.com
ShaderNodePreset.Name: crok digi noise
